verses.verse: When <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H3045>learned<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that had been <S%H6213>done,<s%> he <S%H7167>tore<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> and <S%H665>ashes,<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> out into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H2199>wailed<s%> <S%H1419>loudly<s%> and <S%H4751>bitterly.<s%>

And he <S%H935>went<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the king's <S%H8179>gate,<s%> for <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> was to <S%H935>enter<s%> the king's <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H3830>clothed<s%> in <S%H8242>sackcloth.<s%>

And in <S%H4082>each<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4082>province<s%> <S%H4725>where<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H1697>command<s%> and <S%H1881>decree<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5060>came,<s%> there was <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H60>mourning<s%> among the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> with <S%H6685>fasting,<s%> <S%H1065>weeping,<s%> and <S%H4553>wailing;<s%> and <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3331>lay<s%> on <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> and <S%H665>ashes.<s%>

Then Esther's <S%H5291>maidens<s%> and her <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> her, and the <S%H4436>queen<s%> <S%H9123>writhed<s%> in <S%H3966>great<s%> anguish. And she <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> to <S%H3847>clothe<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> that he might <S%H5493>remove<s%> his <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> from him, but he did not <S%H6901>accept<s%> [them.]

Then <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H7121>summoned<s%> <S%H2047>Hathach<s%> from the king's <S%H5631>eunuchs,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the king had <S%H5975>appointed<s%> to <S%H6440>attend<s%> her, and <S%H6680>ordered<s%> him [to go] to <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> to <S%H3045>learn<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> [was] and <S%H4100>why<s%> it [was.]
So <S%H2047>Hathach<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out to <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7339>square<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the king's <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

And <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> that had <S%H7136>happened<s%> to him, and the <S%H6575>exact<s%> <S%H6575>amount<s%> of <S%H3701>money<s%> that <S%H2001>Haman<s%> had <S%H559>promised<s%> to <S%H8254>pay<s%> to the king's <S%H1595>treasuries<s%> for the destruction of the <S%H6>Jews.<s%>

He also <S%H5414>gave<s%> him a <S%H6572>copy<s%> of the <S%H3791>text<s%> of the <S%H1881>edict<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had been <S%H5414>issued<s%> in <S%H7800>Susa<s%> for their <S%H8045>destruction,<s%> that he might <S%H7200>show<s%> <S%H635>Esther<s%> and <S%H5046>inform<s%> her, and to <S%H6680>order<s%> her to <S%H935>go<s%> in to the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H2603>implore<s%> his <S%H2603>favor<s%> and to <S%H1245>plead<s%> with him for her <S%H5971>people.<s%>
Then <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H2047>Hathach<s%> and <S%H6680>ordered<s%> him [to reply] to Mordecai: <S%H4782><s%>

<S%H3605>"All<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4082>provinces<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> that for <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> or <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> to the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is not <S%H7121>summoned,<s%> he has but <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1881>law,<s%> that he be <S%H4191>put<s%> to <S%H4191>death,<s%> <S%H905>unless<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H834><s%> the king <S%H3447>holds<s%> out to him the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H8275>scepter<s%> so that he may <S%H2421>live.<s%> And I have not been <S%H7121>summoned<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to the king for <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>"

Then <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H559>told<s%> [them] to <S%H7725>reply<s%> to <S%H635>Esther,<s%> "Do not <S%H1819>imagine<s%> that you in the king's <S%H1004>palace<s%> can <S%H4422>escape<s%> any <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews.<s%>

"For <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H2790>remain<s%> <S%H2790>silent<s%> at <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H7305>relief<s%> and <S%H2020>deliverance<s%> will <S%H5975>arise<s%> for the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> from <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> and you and your father's <S%H1004>house<s%> will perish. And <S%H6>who<s%> <S%H4310>knows<s%> <S%H3045>whether<s%> you have not <S%H518>attained<s%> <S%H5060>royalty<s%> for such a <S%H4438>time<s%> as <S%H6256>this<s%>?"

<S%H1980>"Go,<s%> <S%H3664>assemble<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who are <S%H4672>found<s%> in <S%H7800>Susa,<s%> and <S%H6684>fast<s%> for me; do not <S%H398>eat<s%> or <S%H8354>drink<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> or <S%H3117>day.<s%> I and my <S%H5291>maidens<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> will <S%H6684>fast<s%> in the <S%H3651>same<s%> <S%H3651>way.<s%> And <S%H3651>thus<s%> I will <S%H935>go<s%> in to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is not according to the <S%H1881>law;<s%> and <S%H834>if<s%> I perish, I perish."
